function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Stratified random sampling approach may not fully represent the diversity of the population, leading to biased results.","Impact":"Biased representation of the population in the research findings.","Mitigation":"Consider using other sampling methods in conjunction with stratified random sampling to ensure a more comprehensive representation of the population.","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Researchers, statisticians"},{"Description":"Small sample size of 30 may not capture the full variability of the population, leading to limited generalizability of the findings.","Impact":"Limited applicability of research findings to the wider population.","Mitigation":"Consider increasing the sample size or using statistical techniques to account for the limited sample size.","Technologies":"Statistical methodologies for small sample sizes","People":"Researchers, statisticians","Owner":"Researchers, statisticians"}]}
